name: Dude Hardcore
description:
ALIENS have invaded the Earth and are using blown NUCLEAR REACTORS as their base of operations. The radiation of the reactors is causing the SPACE-TIME CONTINUUM to become UNSTABLE, causing massive DANGEROUS ANOMALIES around them! Humanity’s last chance at saving the planet is to send the only man, DUDE HARDCORE, who is hardcore enough to deal with EXTREME SITUATIONS like this!

Music by ISAo at Open Game Art
